plot: Sam is a boy who works at his father's tavern while dreaming of fantastic voyages. One day he gets the chance to try adventure and see if it is what he imagined.
title: El relato de Sam Brennan
plot_es: Sam is a boy who works at his father's tavern while dreaming of fantastic voyages. One day he gets the chance to try adventure and see if it is what he imagined.
plot_en: Sam is a boy who works at his father's tavern while dreaming of fantastic voyages. One day he gets the chance to try adventure and see if it is what he imagined.
